page.title: 11LANSDOWNE HOSPITAL
page.content: Yesterday we went to Lansdowne Hospital. When we got there we saw Mr. Welsh the Hospital Administrator. He took us to his office. First of all he gave us a map of the Hospital. It looked a very big place. He said they had a nurses home where the nurses stay, for eighty nurses. We found out that it is 19 acres in size. Lansdowne Hospital is just a hospital for old people. There is one person who has been there for 24 years. It is a hospital where people stay for a long time. There are 4 wards altogether. The people who work there call the wards houses because they try to make the hospital homely. The four wards are called Ann House which has 25 people, Andrew House which has 25 people, Elizabeth House which has 28 people and last of all there is Charles House, cont.
